title: "Vanderbilt, NIH and the Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale team up to tackle monkeypox"
excerpt: "In this international research cooperation, Vanderbilt is leading the development of AI to automatically localize and count monkeypox lesions, the main measure of disease severity, and spearheading a guideline to classify monkeypox lesions."
